title: Manage Silica Dust Exposure Monitoring
description: During rock drilling operations, a safety officer must ensure compliance with OSHA's silica dust regulations.

tasks.description: Verify that the drill being used is equipped with a required dust control (e.g., a water delivery system).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the engineering control is in place and functional.

tasks.description: Ensure all workers in the area are wearing appropriate respiratory protection (e.g., N95 masks).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all workers have and are using the correct PPE.

tasks.description: Log the use of silica dust controls in the daily safety inspection report.
